title.narrative: 8.3.1 - OFFRE DE SERVICES Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: WASH infrastructure, products and services are available in communities, schools and health centers., which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Hygiene, Sanitation, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Women and children have access to drinking water, to improved sanitation, and they adopt good hygiene practices.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: WASH infrastructure, products and services are available in communities, schools and health centers.

description.narrative: WASH infrastructure, products and services are have been strengthened in communities, schools and health centers. Through the support of UNICEF CDI, the introduction and the professionalization of manual drilling, productive sanitation and sanitation marketing are ongoing in Cote d'Ivoire | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/01/2017

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Schools at which WASH facilities have been installed in the reporting year only, with UNICEF direct support

actual.value: 2017:57 schools have WASH facilities and the construction is on going. In 2016, this target has been review from 138 to 110

title.narrative: Health centres (clinics, hospitals, etc.) equipped with WASH facilities in the reporting year only, as a result of UNICEF direct support

actual.value: 2017:12 health center benefit from WASH facilitiesIn 2016, this target has been review from 110 to 20
